name: ls
description:
List projects in the given directory or file. Return bash command for ls for given directory. Follow the standard unix ls spec.
ls [OPTION]... [FILE]...

path.description: Path to primary argument in ls spec.

options.description: Any user provided details that are mappable to ls spec.

name: cat
description:
Standard unix cat command on file. Return bash command for cat on given file. Follow the standard unix cat spec.
cat [OPTION]... [FILE]...

path.description: Path to primary argument in cat spec.

options.description: Any user provided details that are mappable to cat spec.
